header_text: It's a cold day, and you are out walking to clear your mind. Your hands start to shake and your heart beats quickly as you walk up a hill. This is scary.

elements.text: You remember that this is the first time you have been on a long walk for a couple weeks. You are probably feeling your heart race because of the...
